MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-JAN-2021 22:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in High Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.17pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30pm on 15th January 2021.
